text: E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Mumpikanilani Allah soni ni mumpikanile Ntenga ﷺ, kwisa soni ŵaakwete ulamusi mwa jenumanja (Asilamu). Sano naga ntindene pa chindu chilichose, basi chiuchisyani kwa Allah ni kwa Ntenga ﷺ nam'baga ŵanganyammwe nkunkulupilila Allah ni Lisiku Lyambesi, yalakweyo ni yaili chenene (pakumasya ukangani) soni ni yaikwete yakuichisya yambone nnope
